title: Ansible Training
description: Mindmajix’s Ansible Training will help you develop the skills and knowledge necessary to automate the management and deployment of network devices across Linux or Windows operating systems using Ansible in enterprise environments. It provides in-detailed knowledge on how to create and run Ansible playbooks to automate, and configure systems through hands-on training sessions with real-world examples. You will also be allowed to work on two real-time Ansible projects in your training which are in line with the Ansible Certification Exam.
what_will_learn: |Automating the tasks of system administration on managed hosts with Ansible|Installing and Troubleshooting Ansible on Managed hosts and Central nodes|Writing exceptional Ansible Playbooks to protect encrypted data required for tasks with Ansible Vault|Discovering topology information and integrating nodes about other cluster nodes|Encrypting data using Ansible-vault|Using Ansible Tower to manage organization's Ansible deployment in conjunction with Vagrant in a DevOps environment|Creating environments using isolated configurations to match application development workflow|Deploying and Orchestrating infrastructure applications in a coordinated manner|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Ansible course?The aspirants or the professionals who want to learn Ansible should possess the following:

Linux Command Line Operations
Text Editor
Experience with installing and configuring applications
target_students: |Developers who set up consistent software delivery using automation|System Operations Personnel interested to learn managing infrastructure at Scale|Quality Analysts interested in automating test environment setups|
instructor_bio: With 3+ years of experience in training and nine years of working experience, Bhuvnesh is a certified professional, has trained more than 220+ students and delivered seven corporate firms with live online sessions worldwide.

content: ['What will you Learn in this Course', 'Automation in Cloud(AWS)', 'Automating On Prem(Linux)', 'Automating On Prem(Windows)', 'Securing Our Secrets', 'Getting Disciplined with Roles', 'Automating Ansible playbooks with Jenkins', 'Practice Test & Interview Questions']
short_description: Take your Career to the Next Level with Ansible Training Online

title: Jenkins Training
description: Mindmajix Jenkins Training develops skills and hands-on experience needed to set up and manage Jenkins. This course helps you to master the core concepts of Jenkins such as continuous integration, build and configuration tools, pipelines, continuous deployment, and more related concepts through high-value industry projects and use cases. Our training practices will help you to easily get through the Jenkins Certification Exam.
what_will_learn: |Using Jenkins effectively for building, analyzing, testing and deploying Java projects|Installing Jenkins CI Server on Windows|Implementing Continuous Integration System and Jenkins|Installing and Configuring various Jenkins tools|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Jenkins course?The prerequisites are listed below:

Knowledge of Java
Knowledge of application servers like JBoss, Tomcat, Glassfish, etc.
target_students: |Software architects|Technical project managers|Build Managers|Development and QA engineers|Operational Personnels|
instructor_bio: Having 13+ years of experience working closely with industry, Sanjeev is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged Jenkins, GIT HUB, GIT, GIT LAB and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.

title: SaltStack Training
description: Mindmajix SaltStack training develops the fundamental skills needed to manage and administer multiple server environments using SaltStack automation. It provides an in-depth overview of SaltStack basic commands, installation, configuration, etc., and also deep dives into each and every concept of the SaltStack technology through real-life projects and case studies, and this helps you to become a certified SaltStack Engineer.
what_will_learn: |Using the most powerful system administrator and DevOps tools|Extremely fast and simple IT automation and configuration management|Methods to build servers in no time|Spin-up server for a few minutes, which you need about a few hours before|One server to rule other servers|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the SaltStack course?There are no special prerequisites required for learning this course. But, basic knowledge of Linux and working knowledge of system administration would be an added advantage, but not essential.
To brush up your skills, go through our self-paced videos on:

Linux 
Linux commands

title: Kubernetes Training
description: Mindmajix Kubernetes Training is curated by the best industry experts. This interactive Kubernetes online training helps you master the Kubernetes Features, Kubernetes Architecture, Kubernetes Components and Installation process through hands-on demonstrations. Our Kubernetes Training includes two real-time projects to provide you with a practical understanding of Creating Kubernetes Cluster, Pods, and Deployment file(.YAML). As a part of this Kubernetes course, you will get extensive knowledge of Docker Swarm VS Kubernetes, Kubernetes Services, and Kubernetes Cluster Management Techniques.  Join now in this Kubernetes Online Training, and be a Certified Kubernetes Administrator(CKA).
what_will_learn: |Kubernetes Container Orchestration fundamentals|Installing and Configuring Kubernetes cluster|Deploying and scaling Cluster apps|Understand the Pods, Volumes and Services in Kubernetes|Scheduling Container Applications|Auditing and Troubleshooting Kubernetes Cluster|Kubernetes best Security Practices|Gain knowledge on certified kubernetes administrator concepts|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Kubernetes course?The suggested prerequisites for our training are listed below:

Knowledge of basic DevOps concepts
Knowledge of Docker fundamentals
Knowledge of application deployment process from scratch to production servers
Knowledge on the difference between stateful and stateless applications
instructor_bio: Prashanth has got 20+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
review|1|review: My experience with Mindmajix started with Kubernetes Training, had a great experience with the team and support as well from the staff. The staff had great exposure in the domain and being a real time employee, he had supported a lot of real time work experience. We had a regular query hour after the class completion.
